name: Uptime
description:
They've shutdown the servers.

They've cut the connections.

But they've underestimated you.

They shouldn't have messed with the sysadmin.

Move with WASD or arrows, activate terminals with space. Don't get shot.

Based on xkcd 705.

Made with Unity, Blender, GIMP, bfxr and Krita.

"Eternal Terminal" and "Obliteration" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
